entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sydney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: J.A. Douglas McCurdy Sydney Airport 1:00 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: ENE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow changing to snow at times heavy near noon. Snowfall amount 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
